content.text: Match ends, Manchester United 2, Crystal Palace 0.
Second Half ends, Manchester United 2, Crystal Palace 0.
Corner,  Crystal Palace. Conceded by Phil Jones.
Scott McTominay (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jason Puncheon (Crystal Palace).
Substitution, Manchester United. Angel Gomes replaces Wayne Rooney.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Joel Ward (Crystal Palace) because of an injury.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Fraizer Campbell replaces Wilfried Zaha.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) because of an injury.
Offside, Crystal Palace. Wilfried Zaha tries a through ball, but Christian Benteke is caught offside.

Foul by Axel Tuanzebe (Manchester United).
Bakary Sako (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Bakary Sako (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
